meanings.definition: A slang term for benefits or advantages.
meanings.sent1: Having good health is one of the benes of regular exercise.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the benes of working from home, such as flexibility.
meanings.sent3: The benes of eating vegetables include feeling energetic and strong.
meanings.sent4: The benes of teamwork can lead to greater success in projects.
meanings.sent5: He always appreciates the benes of having supportive friends around him.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'bene', meaning good or well.
meanings.sent1: The students were happy to receive many benes for their hard work.
meanings.sent2: In this community, sharing kindness brings many benes to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The benes of a positive attitude can brighten even the gloomiest days.
meanings.sent4: The benes of honesty are like seeds that grow into trust and respect.
meanings.sent5: She believes in spreading the benes of love wherever she goes.

meanings.sent1: She added some extra benes to the chili for more flavor.
meanings.sent2: The soup was delicious with a mix of different benes in it.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy tried to steal a few benes from the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly cooked benes filled the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: He enjoyed a hearty meal of rice and benes for dinner.
